Title: Can Love Make You Sick?
Plot: Marty is under stress but maintains his elaborate charade. Can he tell the truth? Meanwhile Luc has fun with his new found friend. Maxine records a song and accepts Marty?s heartfelt request, whereas Rachel learns the truth about the father of her child. James?s mother makes an unexpected arrival.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
